results.title: Match Results
results.subtitle: View the latest match results and tournament outcomes.

profileSetup.title: Complete Your Profile
profileSetup.description: To participate in matches as a player, please complete your profile setup.

form.title: Complete Your Profile
form.description: If you are also a player, share your name and surname to activate your profile in the game.
form.termsLabel: I accept the terms and conditions
form.termsDescription: By providing your name, you allow us to match you with existing player profiles in our database.

errors.termsRequired: You must accept the terms and conditions

result.playerFoundDescription: We found a player profile that matches your name. You can claim this profile to participate in matches.
result.claimDescription: By claiming this profile, you will be able to participate in matches and tournaments as this player.
result.termsLabel: I accept the terms and conditions
result.termsDescription: By claiming this profile, you agree to participate in matches and tournaments as this player.
result.noPlayerFoundDescription: We couldn't find a player profile that matches your name. To participate as a tennis player in the app and have your matches available for predictions, you can create a new player profile.
result.createDescription: By creating a player profile, you can participate as a tennis player in the app. Your matches will be available for predictions by other users and you can participate in tournaments. An admin will review and approve your request.
result.nameUsageDescription: This name will be used to create your player profile.
result.credentialsNotice: Use your real name as it appears on official documents for accurate tournament matching.
result.skipDescription: Skip to continue as a regular user. You can set up your player profile later.

success.title: Profile Setup Complete!
success.description: Your profile has been successfully set up.
success.claimedMessage: You have successfully claimed your player profile and can now participate in matches.
success.requestedMessage: Your player profile has been created successfully and is now available.

auth.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain uppercase, lowercase, and numbers
auth.passwordTooWeak: Password is too weak. Please use a stronger password.

matches.title: Tennis Matches
matches.loading: Monitor live tennis events and place your predictions
matches.selectMatchDescription: Choose a match from the sidebar to view details and make predictions
matches.matchNotFoundDescription: Details for this match are not available
matches.makePredictionsDescription: Choose from multiple prediction types to maximize your points!
matches.predictExactScore: Predict the exact score for each set. {player} wins all sets.

matches.tiebreakScoresSelected: You've selected tiebreak scores for some sets. Here you can predict the detailed tiebreak scores within those sets.
matches.setEndedInTiebreak: Set {setNumber} ended in a tiebreak. Predict the detailed tiebreak score:
matches.superTiebreakDescription: Since this is a 2-1 match in amateur format, there will be a 10-point super tiebreak instead of a 3rd set.
matches.superTiebreakWinnerDescription: The super tiebreak winner must be {player} to match your overall prediction.
matches.winsSuperTiebreak: Wins super tiebreak (required for match win)
matches.selectMatchesToAdd: Select matches to add to your slip
matches.combineAllPredictions: Combine all predictions for massive rewards with bonus multipliers!
matches.parlayBenefits: üíé Parlay Benefits: Higher rewards, bonus multipliers, and streak boosters!
matches.unlockParlayMode: to unlock exciting parlay mode with bonus rewards!

players.outrightsDescription: Predict the tournament winner and finals pair for big wins!
players.chooseAgeCategory: Choose your age category to see relevant players and predictions.
players.predictCategoryWinner: Predict who will win the {category} category of the tournament.
players.predictCategoryFinalists: Predict which two players will reach the {category} category final.

players.differentPlayersAndOdds: ‚Ä¢ Each category has different players and odds

players.pleaseSetStakesForOutrights: Please set stakes for all outrights
players.pleaseSetStakesForOutrightsGeneric: Please set stakes for your outrights
players.oneSetPreSelected: One set is pre-selected. Choose who wins the other set.

myPicks.noBetsFound: No predictions found. Start making predictions to see them here!

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
leaderboard.description: Compete with other players and climb the leaderboard to win exciting prizes! Your ranking is based on your prediction accuracy, win streaks, and total points earned.
pointsCalculationList: Correct predictions earn points based on match difficulty
Power-ups can double your points for specific matches
Daily login bonuses add extra points to your total
howToClimbList: Maintain win streaks for bonus multipliers
Log in daily for bonus points
leaderboard.learnAboutPoints: Learn about points calculation, prizes, and strategies
leaderboard.completeGuide: Complete guide to climbing the leaderboard

rewards.title: Rewards
rewards.earnCoinsDescription: Make accurate predictions to earn coins. The more correct picks, the more coins you get!
rewards.redeemCoinsDescription: Use your coins to unlock premium features, exclusive merchandise, and special experiences.
rewards.raritySystemDescription: Items come in different rarities: Common, Rare, Epic, and Legendary. Rarer items offer better value!
rewards.limitedTimeDescription: Some items are featured or discounted for a limited time. Don't miss out on great deals!
rewards.paymentSuccessful: Payment successful! Your coins have been added to your account.
rewards.redeemDescription: Redeem your Coins for exclusive rewards and premium features
rewards.coinTopUpDescription: Purchase coins to unlock powerful upgrades and boost your prediction performance
rewards.noCoinPacks: No coin packs available at the moment.
rewards.powerUpsDescription: Boost your prediction performance with powerful upgrades
rewards.safeSlipsDescription: Protect your predictions from one wrong pick. Perfect for risky parlays or uncertain matches.
rewards.streakMultiplierDescription: Boost your streak points by 50% for 3 days. Great for climbing the leaderboard faster.
rewards.doubleXPMatchDescription: Double your points from a specific match. Use strategically on high-stakes matches.
rewards.proTipsDescription: Power ups are consumed when used. Choose wisely and save them for important moments!
rewards.pleaseSignIn: Please sign in to purchase power-ups
rewards.notEnoughCoinsMessage: Not enough coins! You need {cost} coins.
